text: The Zacatecos (or Zacatecas) is the name of an indigenous people living in the current State of Zacatecas, Aguascalientes and a part of Durango, they were called by the Aztecs as Chichimecas (os). == References == == Other websites == *Powell, Philip Wayne. Soldiers, Indians, & Silver: The Northward Advance of New Spain, 1550-1600. Berkeley, California: University of California Press, 1969. Category:Indigenous peoples Category:Zacatecas Category:Durango
title: Zacateco
